briefdescription.para: Software implementation does not depend on any hardware.

detaileddescription.para: Construct a new hpm software cfft float object

parameterdescription.para: requires double the space than other interfaces, 0-n for input data, n-2n for buffers, 0-n for output data
2^n sampling points, including real and imaginary parts
